items.title: Ben√≠tez ondanks eerherstel tegen Arsenal klaar in bekertoernooi met Palace
items.summary: Arsenal is dinsdagavond doorgedrongen tot de halve finale van de League Cup. Dit gebeurde ten koste van Crystal Palace, dat mede door een uitblinkende Walter Ben√≠tez zijn huid duur verkocht in eigen huis. Het duel werd pas na zestien strafschoppen beslist.

items.title: Arsenal v Crystal Palace: Carabao Cup quarter-final ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from 8pm GMT kick-off as Chelsea await victors ‚öΩ Live scores | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail Taha 3 min: Madueke intercepts a Palace throw on the Arsenal right, plays to Martinelli, his pass cuts straight through the Palace defence. The onrushing Madueke receives ‚Ä¶ and really should do better. He shoots straight at Ben√≠tez. 2 min: Madueke shows off some quick feet to thump a cross in from the right before Arsenal wheel it around in defence. Continue reading...

items.title: USMNT's Richards stretchered off in Carabao Cup
items.summary: Crystal Palace and United States defender Chris Richards was taken from the field on a stretcher during his team's Carabao Cup game against Arsenal on Tuesday.

items.title: NWSL OK's 'Rodman rule' even as union objects
items.summary: The NWSL on Tuesday announced the creation of what has been referred to internally as the "High Impact Player" rule (HIP), which would allow teams to spend up to $1 million outside of the salary cap on star players.

items.title: Sources: City making progress on Semenyo move
items.summary: Manchester City are pushing ahead with a move for Antoine Semenyo, sources have told ESPN, after positive talks with the Bournemouth winger.

items.title: Manchester City favourites to sign Antoine Semenyo after Chelsea withdraw interest
items.summary: Manchester City in advanced talks over ¬£65m winger Bournemouth winger has release clause in January Manchester City are in pole position to sign Antoine Semenyo after Chelsea cooled their interest in the Bournemouth winger. Liverpool and Manchester United have also been pushing for Semenyo, whose contract contains a ¬£65m release clause that becomes active for the first two weeks of January, but it is believed that the 25-year-old‚Äôs preference is to join City. The clause is made up of a ¬£60m fixed fee and ¬£5m in add-ons. Nothing has been agreed yet. Continue reading...

items.title: B√ºttner trots op Manchester United-periode. 'Een droom'
items.summary: Alexander B√ºttner is een jongen van de club Vitesse, maar dat betekent niet dat zijn andere avonturen geen waarde hebben. Met name bij Manchester United heeft de inmiddels 36-jarige verdediger genoten. Hij vertelt erover in het VI Kerstnummer.

items.title: Incredible DOUBLE save as Benitez keeps out Jesus and Madueke!
items.summary: Walter Benitez pulls off an incredible point-blank save to stop Gabriel Jesus' header and denies Noni Madueke on the rebound in Arsenal's Carabao Cup clash with Crystal Palace.

items.title: Afcon roundup: Nigeria squeeze past Tanzania as Senegal cruise to win
items.summary: Nigeria 2-1 Tanzania; DR Congo 1-0 Benin Nicolas Jackson scores twice in Senegal victory Ademola Lookman scored a superb second-half winner as Nigeria earned a 2-1 Group C victory against Tanzania in the pouring rain in Fes, a positive start for the silver medallists from the previous tournament, but one that was not without moments of alarm. Nigeria were more dominant than the scoreline suggests in terms of possession and chances, but they failed to finish off the contest and were almost made to pay for their wastefulness in front of goal. Continue reading...

items.title: Baas zoekt de leider in zichzelf en wijst twee voorbeelden aan
items.summary: Youri Baas vindt dat hij stappen heeft gezet in het ontwikkelen van zijn leiderschap, maar ziet ook nog genoeg ruimte voor verbetering. De 22-jarige Ajacied blikt in een uitgebreid interview terug op zijn ‚Äòbizarre‚Äô 2025.

items.title: Man City in advanced talks with Bournemouth's Semenyo
items.summary: Antoine Semenyo is set to make a final decision on his future with Manchester City in advanced talks over a January move for the Bournemouth forward.

items.title: After years away, Sunderland's Premier League return has revived the club and its city
items.summary: By any measure, Sunderland is one of the revelations of the season. How high they can finish?

items.title: Premier League overreactions: Are Villa in the title race? Can Wolves avoid history?
items.summary: Just before we hit the crowded festive fixtures, we have plenty to overreact to in the Premier League, from the title race down to a potential record-breaking worst season.

items.title: Stewart joins Snoop Dogg and Modric as Swans co-owner
items.summary: The 84-year-old American businesswoman has become the latest celebrity owner of Swansea City.

items.title: Cerny zorgt in Turkije voor bekerverrassing met Besiktas
items.summary: Besiktas is dinsdagavond goed begonnen aan het Turkse bekeravontuur. Aan de hand van V√°clav Cerny werd Fenerbah√ße verslagen. Uitschakeling betekent dat niet voor de Turkse topclub, omdat het bekertoernooi in Turkije een groepsfase kent.

items.title: Lookman knalt Nigeria naar openingszege op Afrika Cup
items.summary: Ademola Lookman heeft Nigeria aan een goede start van de Afrika Cup geholpen. De aanvaller van Atalanta kroonde zich tot matchwinner in het openingsduel met een heerlijke uithaal.

items.title: Van Gerwen leads after Anderson wins, Noppert beaten in epic LIVE!
Man City emerge as Semenyo frontrunners after Chelsea end interest
items.summary: Manchester City are emerging as the frontrunners to sign Antoine Semenyo.

items.title: Baleba: I want to show I can be the world's best midfielder at AFCON
items.summary: Paul Pogba, Thiago Alcantara, Sergio Busquets and Kevin De Bruyne.

items.title: 'I just beat a legend' - Debutant Merk shocks two-time world champion Wright
items.summary: Two-time champion Peter Wright was sent tumbling out of this year's World Darts Championship by German Arno Merk after an enthralling Tuesday afternoon at Alexandra Palace.
